channel.title: RIP Kaitnieks? I THINK NOT!
channel.description:
Were you a previous member of the Kaitnieks forum, and were devastated when they had to shut down because of stupid Fagsex? Well, myself and a group of others have decided to make a tribute to Kaitnieks - Kaitnieks.us
Old users will feel a sense of warmth as they return to the old look and feel of the place. This is for users who want Kaitnieks back. It will take time to implement the awards, but it shouldn't be too hard. Thanks to archive.org, heh.
[url=http://www.kaitnieks.us]Click Here[/url]

item.title: RIP Kaitnieks? I THINK NOT!

item.title: RIP Kaitnieks? I THINK NOT!
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I realize you were just trying to help

I’ll join tomorow night, I need my rest now.

Read full topic

item.title: RIP Kaitnieks? I THINK NOT!
item.dc:creator: @Athrin_Onu Athrin Onu
item.description:
@Athrin_Onu wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:3, topic:2557”]Non-profit, not for your own profit? No need to be redundant.[/quote]Oops, thanks for pointing that out.

Well, it was just an idea. I thought that people might enjoy it just being there. I offered Mopar a copy of vB and that skin, but he never got back to me on it, so I decided to open my own forum with that look and feel.

Read full topic

item.title: RIP Kaitnieks? I THINK NOT!
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

But we have one, right here.

I’m sure if you settled down here and started posting and joining in on things, you’d see this is a very nice forum.

Read full topic

item.title: RIP Kaitnieks? I THINK NOT!
item.dc:creator: @Athrin_Onu Athrin Onu
item.description:
@Athrin_Onu wrote:

It was just a tribute to the original Kaitnieks. I wanted to make an exact duplicate for those who liked it.[br][size=1]Posted at: May 08, 2006, 07:41:25 pm[/size][hr][quote=“jme_009, post:4, topic:2557”]Btw, someone joined there with the name of Kaitnieks. You may want to delete that account :

Oh wait, only 1 member there? So now you guys are pretending to be kaitnieks?[/quote]You’re right. I’m going to change my user name. That just seems wrong, now that I think about it.

Read full topic

item.title: RIP Kaitnieks? I THINK NOT!

item.description:
@jme wrote:

item.title: RIP Kaitnieks? I THINK NOT!
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Non-profit, not for your own profit? No need to be redundant.

Is this approved by Mopar?

Anyways, I’m perfectly fine here, this place resembles Kaitnieks more than any other community.

Read full topic

item.title: RIP Kaitnieks? I THINK NOT!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Im sorry to discourage you, but what exactly is wrong with these forums? These are infested with kaitnikes members, and that is what makes us feel at home here. A familiar name isn’t going to drive people there.

Read full topic
